text: Gaud Sarang is a raga in Hindustani classical music that combines characteristics of Sarang and the now extinct raga named Gaud. Unlike most other members of the Sarang family of ragas, Gaud Sarang is assigned to the Kalyan thaat rather than the usual Kafi. ==Theory== Arohana: Avarohana: ==Notes== ==References== ==Sources== * * Category:Hindustani ragas
title: Gaud Sarang
